entry.title: ISBN:978-87-93619-04-3
entry.content:
1,585 entries
120 pages.
ISBN:978-87-93619-04-3
Vending machine (1,40 €)

Printed and published at the Rietveld Academy.

A simple catalogue of every available item at the academy, including the catalogue itself (on the second page) ‘released’ and made available for sale in the vending machine next to the cantine on the ground floor of the Rietveld Academie.

entry.title: Krokante filosofie
entry.content:
Digital print on hazelnut crocant cake

“The Gerrit Rietveld Academie aims to support talented young people in such a way that they can operate independently in the field of visual arts or design. We want to enable them to sustain their work on their own and become sources of artistic inspiration in their area of specialisation.[…]”
entry.summary: Digital print on hazelnut crocant cake

entry.title: Thank you for your cooperation
entry.content: In front of the new building site a note has been posted that tells the students that any proposals regarding the construction should be passed through the reception desk and not communicated directly to the crew on the building site. In bold red it emphasizes the gap between the students and the executive board of school in which it was conceived.
entry.summary: In front of the new building site a note has been posted that tells the students that any proposals regarding the construction should be passed through the reception desk and not communicated directly to the crew on the building site. In bold red it emphasizes the gap between the students and the executive board of school in which it was conceived.
